name: M.E.M.O.R.Y.
description:
This is a game called M.E.M.O.R.Y. It holds secrets, truths, and lies... You play as a 'bot' with the id of '219'. As you explore the destroyed facility, you find clues that help you figure out what happened here. The technologies THEY created... Currently in development. I would suggest the most recent version : Alpha v1.8.

I have re uploaded the game's versions, again sorry for any inconvenience. I added development logs to go along side with the versions.

~The219
